DOC.criteria: Patients must histologically cytologically confirm advanced ( Stage IIIB malignant pleural effusion Stage IV disease ) recurrent nonsquamous NSCLC . Patients must least one measurable disease per RECIST criterion Patient must disease progression one prior chemotherapy and/or target therapy pemetrexed antiEGFR therapy metastatic disease , relapse receive adjuvant therapy , within 12 month complete adjuvant therapy Patients immunotherapy , hormone , chemotherapy radiotherapy within 4 week ( 6 week nitrosoureas mitomycin C ) prior enter study recover adverse event due agent administer 4 week earlier .
